text:
Head of House [[Phiarlan]] and leader of the [[Demesne of Shadow]],
Elvinor is a [[bard]] of exceptional skill. Their years weigh
upon them, and they are looking for a successor—not someone to lead the house, but someone to learn the secrets that they have borne for centuries. They know tales long
forgotten—stories that might be the key to great adventures. If they take a PC Phiarlan as their apprentice, these secrets could inspire a campaign.
title: Elvinor Elorrenthi d'Phiarlan
